document_data.name: Sul
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sul''' was a zealous [[human]] worshipper of [[the Absolute]] who completed his pilgrimage to the [[Moonrise Towers]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''You... you brought Her the moon-witch. She is pleased - do you see it in Her eyes?''|Mig}}
document_data.Description: Sul was a common human man with bronze skin, dark brown curly hair, and hazel eyes. He had a mustache and a goatee and was dressed in a simple maroon [[tunic]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Sul was among those who joined the new religions that sprang in the [[Western Heartlands]]. Like many others, Sul took on a pilgrimage to the seat of the Absolute's power – the Moonrise Towers – the fortress controlled by the Absolute's warlord – General [[Ketheric Thorm]]. When a group of [[True Soul]] heroes arrived at the Moonrise, Sul cheered for the [[Shadowheart|moon-witch's]] arrival.
